targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, event, instance) (irate(lua_event_latency_bucket{event!~"(init|pre_init)", instance=~"$Host"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Gives a sense of where things are taking time. Have non-zero values here is not necessarily bad, but tall and sustained values is something to look into
panels.title: Blocking

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, event, instance) (irate(lua_event_latency_bucket{event!~"(init|pre_init)", instance=~"$Host"}[$__rate_interval])))
